contact.heroDescription: We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have questions about our landscaping services, need a consultation, or want to discuss your next green project, our team is here to help.

about.title: ABOUT US
about.heroDescription: We're passionate about innovation, quality, and building long-term partnerships. Learn more about who we are and what drives us.
about.storyDescription: Botanic Company, established in 2022, is a leading provider of innovative landscaping, green roof systems, and irrigation solutions in Iraq. With a passion for transforming urban spaces into sustainable ecosystems, we've rapidly expanded our services across the country, delivering high-quality projects that enhance environmental sustainability and aesthetic appeal. Our expertise spans design, installation, and maintenance, ensuring seamless execution and long-term success. From Basra to Erbil, and all major cities in between, we've worked with diverse clients, including companies, institutions, and educational organizations. Our commitment to excellence, professionalism, and environmental stewardship drives us to create thriving green spaces that inspire a healthier, more beautiful Iraq.
about.missionDescription: To deliver high-quality, eco-conscious solutions that empower businesses and individuals to thrive sustainably. We aim to combine modern technology with nature-inspired innovation.
about.visionDescription: To be a global leader recognized for sustainable excellence and innovation â€” shaping a better tomorrow for people, communities, and the environment.
about.innovationDescription: We embrace creativity and forward-thinking to develop solutions that make a real difference.
about.integrityDescription: Honesty, transparency, and respect are at the heart of everything we do.
about.sustainabilityDescription: Our commitment to eco-friendly practices guides every decision we make for a greener planet.
about.established: Botanic Company, established in 2022, is a leading provider of innovative landscaping, green roof systems, and irrigation solutions in Iraq.
